thread.section_title: Peaches Boutique Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Peaches Boutique | peachesboutique.com | 2 of 79
thread.title: Katie Richardson
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Katie Richardson

author: Katie Richardson
title: Katie Richardson
text:
I had issues finding the right dress in my size and Peaches had exactly what I wanted in my size. Everyone was very nice and helpful. When I was wearing the right dress no one held back their opinion, but they did not lie to you and tell you that you looked great in something that you did not.
As long as you are willing to be honest and try on dresses, you will definitely find something you love.
DO go early because some dresses sell out and others are unattainable because of time, but thats not on them.
